summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on an urban road. Initially, the vehicle is driving straight with a bus on the left side. As the vehicle progresses, it approaches a truck parked on the left side of the road. The vehicle then turns right into a parking area, where it encounters several parked cars and pedestrians.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while driving straight. As it approaches the truck on the left side, it prepares to turn right into a parking area. The vehicle slows down and carefully navigates into the parking area, avoiding parked cars and pedestrians.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A bus, approximately 10 meters away, parked and stationary. 2) Left side: A truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked and stationary. 3) Front: Several parked cars, approximately 3 meters away, stationary. 4) Front: Pedestrians, approximately 5 meters away, walking towards the parking area.
